  • Method Details

    • findAll

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Message> findAll​(com.querydsl.core.types.Predicate predicate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Returns a List of Message entities matching the given Predicate. In case no match could be found, an empty List is returned.
      Parameters:
      predicate - must not be null.
      pageable - may be Pageable.unpaged(), must not be null.
      Returns:
      a Page of Message entities matching the given Predicate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if predicate is null or pageable is null

    • findById

      Optional<Message> findById​(Long id)
      Retrieves an Message by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - must not be null.
      Returns:
      the entity with the given id or Optional#empty() if none found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is null.

    • findOneForUpdate

      Optional<Message> findOneForUpdate​(Long id)
      Retrieves an Message by its id. Applies row lock in ensure that only one session can modify it at a time.

      Notice: Can only be called within a transaction scope. Else ...

      Parameters:
      id - must not be null.
      Returns:
      the entity with the given id or Optional#empty() if none found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if id is null.
      javax.persistence.TransactionRequiredException - if not executed within a transaction.

    • create

      Message create​(Message message)
      Creates an Message.
      Parameters:
      message - to be created, must not be null.
      Returns:
      the created Message.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if message is null.

    • update

      Message update​(Message message)
      Updates an Message.
      Parameters:
      message - to be updated, must not be null.
      Returns:
      the updated Message.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if message is null.

    • delete

      Message delete​(Long id)
      Deletes a Message.
      Parameters:
      id - of the message to be deleted, must not be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if kd is null.
